text:
We are getting  (PR_PROC_DESC_TABLE_FULL_ERROR: file descriptor table full) 
error in the application.
The problem is due to toomany logfile connections opened.
We have a single log file created for each transaction.
In this regard we process more than 2000 transactiosn in a day for which we 
require 2000 log files connection opened.
somewhere b/w 1000 to 1500 trxn processing we have the server crashed with  
(PR_PROC_DESC_TABLE_FULL_ERROR: file descriptor table full) problem.
When we did the lsof -p  <PID> we can see all the process completed trans log 
file connection still open .
Can we have the each of the log file connection closed?
Please advice
